name: update_plan
arguments: {"explanation":"Outlining steps to create a simple static landing page for iPhone 17 Pro.","plan":[{"status":"pending","step":"Create index.html with basic HTML structure and content"},{"status":"pending","step":"Create styles.css for styling the page"},{"status":"pending","step":"Optionally add script.js for a simple countdown timer"},{"status":"pending","step":"Verify files are created correctly"}]}

name: file.edit
arguments: {"instructions":"Replace the entire content with this HTML structure for a coming soon page: <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> <title>iPhone 17 Pro - Coming Soon</title> <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.css"> </head> <body> <header> <h1>iPhone 17 Pro</h1> </header> <main> <section class="hero"> <h2>Revolutionizing Mobile Technology</h2> <p>Get ready for groundbreaking features like AI-powered camera, ultra-fast processor, and immersive display. Launching soon!</p> <div id="countdown">Countdown to launch: <span id="timer"></span></div> <form> <input type="email" placeholder="Enter your email for updates" required> <button type="submit">Notify Me</button> </form> </section> </main> <footer> <p>&copy; 2023 Apple Inspired (For presentation only)</p> </footer> <script src="script.js"></script> </body> </html>","path":"index.html"}

Launching soon!</p>\\n            <div id=\\\"countdown\\\">Countdown to launch: <span id=\\\"timer\\\"></span></div>\\n            <form>\\n                <input type=\\\"email\\\" placeholder=\\\"Enter your email for updates\\\" required>\\n                <button type=\\\"submit\\\">Notify Me</button>\\n            </form>\\n        </section>\\n    </main>\\n    <footer>\\n        <p>&copy; 2023 Apple Inspired (For presentation only)</p>\\n    </footer>\\n    <script src=\\\"script.js\\\"></script>\\n</body>\\n</html>\"","path":"index.html"}

content.text:
<parameter name="content"><!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>iPhone 17 Pro - Coming Soon</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.css">
</head>
<body>
    <header>
        <h1>iPhone 17 Pro</h1>
    </header>
    <main>
        <section class="hero">
            <h2>Revolutionizing Mobile Technology</h2>
            <p>Get ready for groundbreaking features like AI-powered camera, ultra-fast processor, and immersive display. Launching soon!</p>
            <div id="countdown">Countdown to launch: <span id="timer"></span></div>
            <form>
                <input type="email" placeholder="Enter your email for updates" required>
                <button type="submit">Notify Me</button>
            </form>
        </section>
    </main>
    <footer>
        <p>&copy; 2023 Apple Inspired (For presentation only)</p>
    </footer>
    <script src="script.js"></script>
</body>
</html></parameter>
</xai:function_call>

name: shell
shell
arguments:
{"command":["powershell","-Command","Set-Content -Path 'index.html' -Value @' iPhone 17 Pro - Coming Soon

iPhone 17 Pro

Revolutionizing Mobile Technology

Get ready for groundbreaking features like AI-powered camera, ultra-fast processor, and immersive display. Launching soon!

Countdown to launch:

© 2023 Apple Inspired (For presentation only)

'@"]}

name: update_plan
arguments: {"explanation":"Completed creating index.html.
